about-section.heading: We Are
about-section.subheading: Your Trusted and Creative Web Development Team
about-section.description: At CodeLens, we understand that every project is unique. We specialize in building digital solutions tailored to the needs of small and medium-sized businesses, creating an effective and lasting online presence.

get-to-know-section.heading: Get to Know Us
get-to-know-section.description: At CodeLens, we take pride in our quality and efficiency in every project. We tailor our solutions to each client's goals and work flexibly to ensure lasting and satisfying results.

contact-section.heading: Contact Us
contact-section.intro-text: We are here to help you level up. Let's talk about your next project!
contact-section.intro-description: Whether you need a website from scratch, want to improve your current one, or develop a custom application, we are here to assist you. At CodeLens, we are committed to clear and effective tech solutions. Reach out and see how we can collaborate.
contact-section.socials-message: At CodeLens, we love collaborating with passionate people and businesses. We look forward to hearing from you soon!

footer-section.intro: Turn ideas into online excellence with our innovative solutions and strategic digital services
